attributes.action: STOP THE KILLINGS - ENOUGH IS ENOUGH - ZERO TOLERANCE TO KNIFE AND GUN CRIMES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To hear today about the 18th person to die and for his last words to be "I don't want to die" and "where's my mum, I want my mum"

This is surely enough to make everyone stand up and say “NO MORE”, it should never have got to this.

It’s so simple, we have to now come together as one nation regardless of Colour, Religion OR Political beliefs. We need to tell OUR GOVERNMENT TO ACT and that we wont stand for this anymore.  Too many people are getting killed and too many people are suffering the aftermath.  Tell our government they have to listen to us as one voice.  No more maybe’s  if’s or buts.  JUST DO.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
